name: Kiwi Thermopack
overview:
Founded in the year 2001, at Noida (India), we, “Kiwi Thermopack”, are the leading name engaged in manufacturing, supplying, trading & distributing a comprehensive assortment of Thermocole, Air Bubbles, EPE Foams, Corrugated Boxes etc. Our exclusive range includes EPS Thermocole Blocks, EPS Thermocole Sheets, Thermocole Beads, EPS Thermocole Pipe Sections, Thermocol Boxes, Air Bubble Rolls, Air Bubble Sheets, Air Bubble Pouches, Laminated Air Bubbles, EPE Foam Rolls, EPE Foam Pouches, EPE Foam Sheets, EPE Foam Fitments.

Product Range: EPS (Thermocole Blocks, Sheets, Moulding & Beads)
Air Bubble Film (Rolls, Sheets & Pouches) EPE Foam (Rolls, Sheets, Customized Fitments, Pouches, Back-up Rods, Profiles, Insulation Tubes, EPE Mesh or Fruit Net) Corrugated Boxes (Die Cut Boxes, Brown Paper Boxes, Printed Boxes)

Main Application of Products: Packaging Insulation Sound proofing.

Infrastructure: We have a state-of-the-art infrastructure facility equipped with advance manufacturing technologies and machines that assist us to fabricate the best quality products. This unit is segregated into a number of departments such as manufacturing, quality control, research & development, warehouse & packaging, sales & marketing, etc.

Our Team: Production experts Quality inspectors Sales professionals Logistics experts Warehousing personnel Skilled workers Non-skilled workers

Quality: Since our inception, quality standardization has always been our prime objective. Our highly skilled quality experts make us highly efficient in delivering best quality products to our clients. The offered products are manufactured under the strict guidance of our skilled professionals in compliance with international quality standards. Our quality controllers strictly monitor different stages of production processes, right from procurement of raw material till the final dispatch of products.

Why Us?: We are a leading manufacturer and supplier of a comprehensive assortment of Thermocole, Air Bubble, EPE Foam, Corrugated Boxes, etc. Our exclusive range includes EPS Thermocole Blocks, EPS Thermocole Sheets, EPS Thermocole Pipe Section, Thermocole Boxes, Corrugated Pizza Boxes, Gable Boxes, White Corrugated Boxes, Shelf Type Boxes, etc.
